summary: I'm a Digital Arts Student and future 3D Character Artist, I'm passionate, I'm dedicated, I'm resilient, I'm someone who wants to learn, help and grow with everyone I meet. As the lyrics of STAR WALKIN' say, 'Don't ever say it's over if I'm breathing / Racing to the moonlight and I'm speeding / I'm headed to the stars, ready to go far / I'm star walking'.

recommendations.name: Armando DÃ¡vila
recommendations.position: 3D Generalist / 3 Years of Experience / 2 Launched Titles
recommendations.quote: Manolo is a super passionate and committed 3D Character Artist. He's always looking to learn, improve, and help others along the way. Working with him is always a good experience. He brings great energy, creativity, and a strong sense of responsibility to the table. Definitely someone you want on your team.
